post.author: rich_is_bored
post.body:
The modelling looks good and clean.

As far as textures are concerned, it's not entirely clear what you're trying to do here. In the first shot it looks like your re-using the eye texture and my first impression was that you assigned the wrong texture to the body. The UV map isn't suited for that texture or vice versa as it's clear where the seams are.

In the remaining shots it I get the feeling I'm looking at a mannequin. There's no variation in the skin tones and the solid red lipstick gives it a very doll-like appearance.

Hope that doesn't come off as too harsh but as I said earlier, it's not clear what you're aiming for here so my critique could be way off the mark.

post.author: lowdragon
post.body: exactly ... however i edited the post so it makes more sense.
